name: Dinkys Quest
description: Dinky is found enjoying his view of the land that he protects from a bluff. From a distance a greedy figure sees the gold on his back, and decides to push dinky off of the bluff, and take his gold. Dinky wakes up from his concussion, and he has suffered extreme amnesia. Dinky has forgotten his ways of being a protector, and must learn by going through a long adventure to regain his skills he once had. Throughout his adventure he will slowly regain his skills, and become the once proud protector he always was.
